ComicInfo.Summary:
Oliver, Invincible's step brother, receives a new tutor. Robot introduces his new body (cloned from Rex Splode) to the Guardians of the Globe. Invincible visits Art, and discusses his girl problems between Atom Eve and Amber. During this time Amber gets a number from a guy named Gary who attends her school. Invincible changes the subject to talk about his father, and about the peculiar words he told him after he was taken away by Viltrumites, "read my books!". Art gives Invincible copies of his books and Mark is shocked all of these books are about space adventures, and the things that can hurt Viltrumites. Mark comes to a startling conclusion that through these books his dad is telling him how to beat the Viltrumites.
Features a Capes backup story.
